title: Project to Strengthen Concept Learning Mechanisms Through Mathematical Activities

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and problem-solving experience
context.additional_context: Creating collaborative learning environments using digital tools and providing continuous feedback through formative assessments

learning_goals: Learners can reconstruct and explain the concept of limits of functions through mathematical activities
Learners can create learning portfolios focusing on conceptual formation mechanisms rather than problem-solving processes
Learners can analyze cognitive conflicts arising during mathematical modeling using digital tools and connect them to conceptual expansion
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
